input_path.description: Path to the input CSV dataset file (required).

quantization_bits.description: Quantization coefficient in bits per feature value (1-8). Higher values = more precision but larger file size.

model_name.description: Model name for output filenames. If empty, extracted from input filename.

header_mode.description: CSV header handling: 'auto' = detect automatically, 'yes' = skip first line, 'no' = process all lines.

label_column.description: Column index containing the label (0 = first column).

max_features.description: Maximum number of features to process (1-1023). Features beyond this limit will be truncated.

remove_outliers.description: Apply Z-score outlier clipping during preprocessing. true = adapts to gradually changing data streams (removes outliers), false = adapts to suddenly fluctuating data streams (keeps all variations).

max_samples.description: Maximum samples retained in mcu binary dataset (FIFO). -1 = current dataset size (default), >0 = specific limit. Oldest samples removed when limit exceeded.

run_visualization.description: Whether to generate quantization visualization plots after processing.
